features: ❤【High-Quality Material】--- Reinforced iPhone charger cable, Tough aluminum alloy connector, which can effectively prevent rust and oxidation, internally strengthened, optical fiber, high-purity copper wire and have passed 50000+ times bending tests, The TPE material of areson is different from other TPE, It will not burn when you hold it.The light is soft and not dazzling.

❤【Fast Charge and Data Transmission】--- High-quality four-core copper wire, which improves the charging and data transmission speed of the iphone charging cable (up to 2.4A current). The built-in MFi certified chipset ensures a faster charging time and at the same time ensures that your device is completely safe. Each cable contains a unique, verified serial number and an authorized chip to ensure 100% compatibility with any Lightning device.

❤【Perfect Compatibility】--- iPhone charger compatible with iPhone 13/13Mini/13Pro/13Pro Max/12/12Pro/12Pro Max/12 Mini/11Pro Max/11Pro/11/XS/iPhone Max/iPhone XR/iPhone X/iPhone 8 Plus/iPhone 8/iPhone 7 Plus/iPhone 7/iPhone 6s Plus/iPhone 6s/iPhone 6 Plus/iPhone 6/iPhone 5s/iPhone 5c/iPhone 5/iPad Pro/iPad Air/Air 2/iPad mini/mini 2/mini 4/iPad 4th gen/iPod Touch 5th gen/ iPod as well as the latest iOS 11 12 13 system.
❤【What You Get】--- 1PACK MFi Certified Led iPhone charging cables in 3FT Red. Replace your iPhone accessories cables or add another iPhone cord for home, work or travel.

√【Satisfactory Service】--- We are committed to ensuring that you are 100% satisfied. If you have any questions during the use, not satisfied with our products or services please contact us by email directly, we will do our best to provide you with satisfactory and friendly service within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welcome to the Bestmo Store, you can choose your favorite electronic products! Why choose Bestmo's Apple Led Lightning Cable? ✔With an innovative streamer effect, the beautiful flowing light will move with the current, and you can quickly find your phone in the dark, bringing convenience and fun to your life! Add a nice atmosphere in different environments. ✔Durable, Tangled-free charger cable, reinforced iPhone charging cable, sturdy aluminum alloy connector, The soft and strong TPE shell, excellent resistance to damage, you can use it for a long time. ✔Built with Apple's upgarded terminal and smart chipset promise no warning message pops up. Each cable contains a unique, serial number and an authorization chip issued by the official agency to ensure 100% compatibility with any Lightning device. ✔2.4A Fast Charge and 480Mbps Fast Sync. High-Quality Copper Cord and upgraded 8 Pin connector, which improves the charging and data transmission speed of the iphone charging cable. ✔It is very durable, with a unique reinforced SR cable connector, which is not easy to break, and you can find your phone before going to bed.

Product Parameters: Material: TPE, Optical Fiber, Copper Wire, Aluminum Alloy Head Cable Length: 3FT Color: red Bend Lifespan: 50000 times Charging Current: 2.4A Transmission Speed: 480Mb/s You will get: 1x box-pack LED USB A to Lightning iPhone Charge Cable Perfect Compatibility: - iPhone 13/12 /11 / Pro / MAX / Mini/ XR/ XS - iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus - iPhone 7 / 7 Plus - iPhone 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus - iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C / SE - iPad Pro/ iPad Air / iPad Air 2 - iPad mini / iPad mini 2 / iPad mini 3 / iPad mini 4 - iPod Touch 5th Gen / iPod Nano 7th Gen

Beautiful Light Effect and Unique Design We use hard TPE materials, precision laser welding, aluminum alloy connectors, and the entire life cycle of charging can be obtained from a single cable. Especially in the dark, the lightning cable can easily decorate your space. It is both novel and cool. You can quickly find a charging mobile phone in the dark. Convenience and Freedom The perfect length of these charging cables allows you to charge anytime and anywhere in the car, which is very convenient and free. The led lighting iPhone cable is especially suitable for use in the car. When you drive at night, you can easily find the bright data cable. The light is beautiful and bright, and the brilliant light becomes a cool decoration on the car. Fast Charging & Data Transfer When you are working, These Led Lightning charge cables can make your phone fast charging and fast data information transmission, up to 2.4A. High-quality copper wire will give you ultra fast charging data up than normal cable, ensure that you and your devices are safe.

We use hard TPE materials, precision laser welding, aluminum alloy connectors, and the entire life cycle of charging can be obtained from a single cable. Especially in the dark, lightning lines can easily decorate your space. It is novel and cool. You can quickly find a charging phone in the dark. Our Lightning data cable is very durable, the unique reinforced SR data cable connector is not easy to break, you can find your phone before going to bed. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the light up cord
reviews.reviewText: The cord works great and looks really nice when plugged up. The only change I would suggest is for the cord to only light up when actually charging. It stays lit all of the time once plugged up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's A Very Good Product And I Just Love It When Your Phone Charges And Color Starts To Glow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dim light, good product overall
reviews.reviewText: Light is not as bright as I expected. Functionality works just fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light Up Charger
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best charger's I have ever brought. Looks great and works just as great as it looks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work
reviews.reviewText: First day - Stays lit for 5 seconds then turns off. Tried many times. Returning item. Do not waste your time and money on this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like a lot.
reviews.reviewText: Cool looking. Turns off when not plugged into phone and when 100% charged. Nice rubbery feel. Good connections. Happy so far.
